Articles.Content:
Hello fellow KSP players, I'm currently working on a tutorial series to teach you everything from ship building to docking to planetary travel! I will be uploading one per day and on some days, I will upload two or more! Anyway, please check out my first video and subscribe for the awesomeness to come!

My first video-how to install downloaded ships(for those who will follow my series I put my ships up for download): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3niktK1gdBQ
